name: Threedox
overview: A game of noughts and crosses in three diminsions in a cube 4*4*4. All youhave to do is fill a complete row column or diagonal with X's in any direction. A sort of "3D" version of Four in a Row, based on the public domain game Threedox by D. Hall. Published in the 75 Spill-compilation from Data-Tronic.
